title: Just got a message saying my acount was logged in from another computer
body: what does this mean? What do i do! Please help based Rito!!! :'(

replies.body: Oh gosh no! That's a pretty good sign that someone might have been able to hack their way into your account without your knowing! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can, and once they can verify you as the original creator you'll be back on the Rift in no time!
